item.title: There are gems, then there are rubies. Joshua Tree is without doubt the most underrated National Park in the United States. The decision to voyage into the Mojave was complete spur of the moment and the reward was one of the most epic voyages in my lifetime #JoshuaTree #Desert #Coyote #camping #Sunset #moon #hiddengem #goexplore
item.description: There are gems, then there are rubies. Joshua Tree is without doubt the most underrated National Park in the United States. item.title: Waist high water for a few miles and it was well worth it. Welcome to Zion. #zionnationalpark #NationalParks #TheNarrows #goexplore #travel #canyon #trekking #utah #thirstythursday
item.description: Waist high water for a few miles and it was well worth it. Welcome to Zion. #zionnationalpark #NationalParks #TheNarrows #goexplore #travel #canyon #trekking #utah #thirstythursday

item.title: Here was a shot I took a few weeks ago just outside of Portland. If you ever go, you must climb to the very top, hop the railing, and overlook the edge #multnomahfalls #Waterfalls #goexplore #eatsomeconcrete
item.description: Here was a shot I took a few weeks ago just outside of Portland. If you ever go, you must climb to the very top, hop the railing, and overlook the edge #multnomahfalls #Waterfalls #goexplore #eatsomeconcrete

item.title: Thousands of years of history, all within only a few miles. One word to describe the Sequoia National Forest - humbling. #GoPro #Hero4 #goexplore #sequoia #NationalParks #California #lifeisgood
item.description: Thousands of years of history, all within only a few miles. One word to describe the Sequoia National Forest - humbling. #GoPro #Hero4 #goexplore #sequoia #NationalParks #California #lifeisgood

item.title: The Oregon Coastline. Waves crashing into giant monoliths, and sea foam lining the beaches #oregoncoast #monolith #peace
item.description: The Oregon Coastline. Waves crashing into giant monoliths, and sea foam lining the beaches #oregoncoast #monolith #peace

item.title: In my lifetime I've never seen a waterfall/hiking trail in the continental United States quite like the gorge, just outside of Portland. Beautiful area and a must see for anyone passing through. Be prepared to hike through waist high chilled waters with potential sightings of Pterodactylus swooping down from above.
item.description: In my lifetime I've never seen a waterfall/hiking trail in the continental United States quite like the gorge, just outside of Portland. Beautiful area and a must see for anyone passing through. Be prepared to hike through waist high chilled waters with potential sightings of Pterodactylus swooping down from above.

item.title: Was fortunate to catch both sunrise and sunset at Crater Lake. The lake is 1900ft deep and was originally measured in the 1800s with a plank of wood and weighted piano wire.
item.description: Was fortunate to catch both sunrise and sunset at Crater Lake. The lake is 1900ft deep and was originally measured in the 1800s with a plank of wood and weighted piano wire.

item.title: Driving down the highway and saw these massive cliffs from 30 miles away #grandtetons #wyoming #GoPro #Hero4 #adventure #roadtrip
